Package persistence

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Persistence
    Provides static methods for saving and loading the game and map editor state using JAXB (Java Architecture for XML Binding).
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PersistenceException
    An extension of RunTimeException to signal unexpected behaviour in the persistence methods.
